Journal of Personality and Social Psychology, 56(5), 722-734. Footnote Let a denote the increase in subjective well-being that high donors experience as a result of the donation opportunity, and let b denote the decrease in the subjective well-being of high-donors. If p denotes the proportion of high donors, then the average change is pa-(1-p)b. Hence, the overall change is positive as long as p is larger than b/(a+b).
